definition[0]: to offend someone by saying or doing something they think is rude
example[0]: Nobody insults my family and gets away with it!
example[1]: I hope Andy won’t be insulted if I don’t come.
example[2]: They insult us by ignoring our complaints.
definition[1]: a remark or action that is offensive or deliberately rude
example[3]: She was shouting insults at her boyfriend.
example[4]: $200 for all that work? It’s an insult.
example[5]: Their offer was so low I took it as an insult  (=thought it was meant to be an insult).
